summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Lighting; authorizing a partial release to Verle M. Bleese and to owners and parties otherwise interested in properties in Blocks 2, 3, 4, 8, 9, 10, 11, 14, 15, 16 and 17 in Hawthorne Hills Addition, of rights granted or assigned to the City under an easement for overhead electrical distribution facilities.
